name: ghost-draw
description: Draw directly on your screen with a transparent overlay
author: RuntimeRascal

scripts.clean: dotnet clean GhostDraw.sln && npm run clean:installer
scripts.clean:installer: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path Installer/bin) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force Installer/bin }; if (Test-Path Installer/obj) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force Installer/obj }"
scripts.publish: dotnet publish Src/GhostDraw/GhostDraw.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=false
scripts.publish:ver: dotnet publish Src/GhostDraw/GhostDraw.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=false -p:Version=%VER%
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run installer
scripts.release:ver: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run installer:ver
scripts.dev: dotnet build Src/GhostDraw/GhostDraw.csproj && dotnet run --project Src/GhostDraw/GhostDraw.csproj
